translations: 使分裂成原子；使雾化（atomise 的过去式和过去分词，等于 atomize）

sentences.sentence: It is becoming an atomised, individualistic world.
sentences.translation: 世界正在变成一个分散如原子的，极端个人主义的地方。

sentences.sentence: In the last few years our communities have broken down and become atomised.
sentences.translation: 在最近几年我们的社区已经分散开变得越来越原子化了。

sentences.sentence: When set against the atomised solitude of some forms of contemporary western.
sentences.translation: some forms of contemporary Western existence不等于“当代某些西方存在。”
